title: I Don't Wish Nobody to Have a Life Like Mine.pdf
description:
I Don't Wish Nobody to Have a Life Like Mine: Tales of Kids in Adult Lockup


Beacon Press | February 22, 2011 | ISBN-10: 0807001236 | 216 pages | PDF | 1.2 MB

David Chura taught high school in a New York county penitentiary for ten yearsÃ¢â‚¬â€five days a week, seven hours a day. In these pages, he gives a face to a population regularly demonized and reduced to statistics by the mainstream media. Through language marked by both the grit of the street and the expansiveness of poetry, the stories of these young people break down the diÃ‚Â­visions we so easily erect between us and them, the keepers and the keptÃ¢â‚¬â€and call into question the increasing practice of sentencing juveniles as adults.
